content.title: Ship faster with Nexcn
content.subtitle: A Next.js 16 starter with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, Base UI, shadcn/ui, internationalization, testing, and code quality tools configured out of the box.

instructions.line1: - This is the homepage. Edit it at app/[locale]/page.tsx
instructions.line2: - Edit navbar in components/navigation.tsx (desktop) and components/mobile-navigation.tsx (mobile drawer), footer in components/footer.tsx
instructions.line3: - Logo in /public/nexcn.svg, favicon and OpenGraph images in /app
instructions.line4: - Content and translations in messages/en.json and messages/ar.json
instructions.line5: - SEO metadata in app/[locale]/layout.tsx, sitemap in app/sitemap.ts

navigation.nexcnDescription: Next.js starter with Base UI and internationalization

footer.description: A Next.js 16 starter with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, Base UI, testing, and bilingual support built in.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: An error occurred while loading this page. Try refreshing or going back.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: This page doesn't exist or has been moved.
